sourcesContent:
import { Box, Grid, Icon, MenuList, MenuItem, ListItemText, Paper, Stack, Typography } from "@material-ui/core";
import Masonry, { ResponsiveMasonry } from "react-responsive-masonry";
import avatar from "../images/profilePic.jpg";
import { blue, indigo } from '@material-ui/core/colors';


function AboutMe() {
    return (

        <Box sx={{ backgroundColor: 'red', width: { xs: 1, xl: 6 / 12 }, alignSelf: 'center' }}>
            <ResponsiveMasonry
                columnsCountBreakPoints={{ 350: 1, 750: 2, 900: 2 }}>
                <Masonry gutter='0.5rem' style={{ padding: '0.4rem' }}>
                    {/* profile card  */}
                    <Paper elevation={2} sx={{ borderRadius: '0.5rem' }}>
                        <Grid container>
                            <Grid item flexGrow='1'>
                                <Box sx={{ height: '100%', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: 're' }}>
                                    <Box component='img' width='9rem' src={avatar} sx={{ borderRadius: '0.5rem', border: '1px solid #d3d3d3', p: 10 / 12 }} />
                                </Box>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item flexGrow='0.6'>
                                <Box sx={{ width: '100%', height: '12rem', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', backgroundColor: 'blu', gap: 1.5 }}>
                                    <Typography sx={{ fontSize: '1.5rem', fontFamily: 'sans-serif', fontWeight: '600', color: 'success.dark' }}>
                                        Brian Ojoh Mile
                                    </Typography>
                                    <Typography sx={{ fontWeight: '600', fontSize: '1.1rem' }}>Full Stack Developer</Typography>
                                    <Typography sx={{ fontWeight: '600', fontSize: '1.1rem' }}>Laurel, MD</Typography>
                                    <Stack direction='row' spacing={1} sx={{ border: 2, p: 1, borderRadius: '1rem', color: 'error.main' }}>
                                        <Icon component='a' baseClassName='fab' className='fa-github' sx={{ fontSize: '1.8rem', color: 'error.main' }}
                                            href='https://github.com/Feidorian' target='_blank' />
                                        <Icon baseClassName='fab' className='fa-linkedin' sx={{ fontSize: '1.8rem', color: 'error.main' }}
                                            component='a' href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/brian-ojoh-mile-a5a7b9154/" target='_blank' />
                                    </Stack>
                                </Box>
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                    </Paper>

                    {/* general info card  */}
                    <Paper elevation={2} sx={{ borderRadius: '0.5rem', }}>
                        <MenuList>
                            <MenuItem>
                            <ListItemText>Full Name</ListItemText>
                            <ListItemText>Full Name</ListItemText>
                            </MenuItem>
                            
                        </MenuList>
                    </Paper>
                    
                    {/* personal quote card  */}
                    <Paper elevation={2} sx={{ borderRadius: '0.5rem', backgroundColor: indigo[900], color: 'white' }}>
                        <Typography sx={{ textAlign: 'center', p: '0.3rem', fontStyle: 'italic' }}>
                            "Programming to me is the multitudes of points where imagination meets reality. The multitude
                            of points when I gaze over fragments of code and Exclaim to
                            myself: I IMAGINED that, I BUILT that, and I made it USEFUL."
                        </Typography>
                    </Paper>
                </Masonry>
            </ResponsiveMasonry>
        </Box>

    )
}

export default AboutMe;
